ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LD50 ANAS PLATYRHYNCHOS (MALLARD) ORAL 3.05 MG/KG, 3 MO OLD FEMALES (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 2.91-5.00) /SAMPLE PURITY 80%/
LD50 PERDIX PERDIX (PARTRIDGE) ORAL 9.7 MG/KG, 3 MO OLD FEMALES & MALES (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 8.3-11.3)
LD50 ZENAIDA MACROURA (MOURNING DOVE) ORAL MALES AND FEMALES 2.0-4.0 MG/KG
LD50 ZENAIDA ASIATICA (WHITE WINGED DOVE) ORAL, ADULT MALE AND FEMALE, 2.93 MG/KG (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 2.44-3.66 MG/KG) /SAMPLE PURITY 80%/

EC50 Simocephalus serrulatus 0.012 mg/L/48 hr at 15 °C, first instar (95% confidence limit 0.0079-0.018 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

EC50 Daphnia pulex 0.010 mg/L/48 hr at 15 °C, first instar (95% confidence limit 0.0067-0.015 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Gammarus fasciatus 0.013 mg/L/96 hr at 15 °C, mature (95% confidence limit 0.006-0.028 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Pteronarcys californica 1.5 mg/L/96 hr at 15 °C, second year class (95% confidence limit 0.77-2.92 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (rainbow trout) 7.8 mg/L/96 hr at 15 °C, wt 0.8 g (95% confidence limit 6.2-9.8 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 100 mg/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.0 g (95% confidence limit 91-110 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Ictalurus punctatus (channel catfish) 70 mg/L/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 0.8 g (95% confidence limit 67-74 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill) 3.4 mg/L/96 hr at 24 °C, wt 0.5 g (95% confidence limit 2.4-4.9 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 80%/
LD50 Coturnix japonica (Japanese quail) oral 3.60 mg/kg, adult females (95% confidence limit 1.80-7.20 mg/kg) /Sample purity 85%/
LD50 Phasianus colchicus (pheasants) oral 4.24 mg/kg, 4 month old female (95% confidence limit 3.37-5.34 mg/kg) /Sample purity 85%/
LD50 Alectoris chukar oral 11.8 mg/kg, 3 to 5 month old males and females (95% confidence limit 10.1-13.8 mg/kg) /Sample purity 80%/
